channel.title: Protocols on Layer9
channel.description: Recent content in Protocols on Layer9

item.title: BIND9: from the start
item.description: BIND9 Installation The system where this BIND9 service was installed is the same described in the article TinyCoreLinux Installation. There is a BIND9 package for TinyCore, but jusk like almost everything else, the installation is very do-it-yourself1. We’re not provided with a firelighter, and not even matches; we really have to scratch a couple of sticks next to some kindling to get some fire. The BIND9 extension can be installed from the browser tce-ab or directly by the installer tce-load
